insert into ecs_ego_qa_question (id, title, user_id, keywords, status, tags_id, favor_times, share_times, userhost, useragent, userloc, deleted_at, updated_at, created_at, content ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tagsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{favorTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shareTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userhost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useragent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userloc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deletedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update ecs_ego_qa_question set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, keywords = #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tags_id = #{tagsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, favor_times = #{favorTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, share_times = #{shareTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, userhost = #{userhost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, useragent = #{useragent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userloc = #{userloc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deleted_at = #{deletedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
